xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/976728-Destroy The Corpse 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tkyomomX7mi3Cwd8b6DaHwiJuWr.jpg Gu Hua is a computer programmer who lived with accountant Zi Yu because of a lack of public funds. Later, in order to gain wealth and honor, he secretly communicated with the chairman 's daughter Huang Shibei. As a result , the stinky history of that year was exposed and made him face ruin. In order not to put himself in jail and to marry Shibei in the future, he killed Ziyu and destroyed the evidence. But I didn't expect that the retribution that followed would make Gu Hua feel unbearable. Destroy The Corpse
